main event: A saucer-shaped object was observed hovering at a low altitude over Pantelleria Island in the Mediterranean, making a straight climb before disappearing in a few seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared very much silver, with no wings or other visible features.
The sighting occurred around 8:15 AM on June 20, 1952 on a small farm.
The witness had insects on their sweater and shook them off, which is when they noticed the hovering object.
The object was estimated to be around 20 feet in diameter.
The witness could not understand or explain what they saw, describing it as a strange sight.
witnesses: a single witness on a small farm
